title.rendered: Eldorado Outdoor Made its Way Inside Interior Design!

content.rendered: Eldorado Stone’s Artisan Fire Bowl was selected for Interior Design’s October 2013 Fall Market Tabloids – the essential new product resource for “must haves” for Fall! It’s “only natural” that the Fire Bowl won in the outdoor category. See the award-winning product in full display in the feature titled “sleek amenities for life alfresco.”
